description: ff. 8. 208 x 146; 150 x 111 mm. 21 lin. 12th cen. On fol. 7b-8b four samāʻ notes, the first dat. Muḥarram 574 and signed by al-Silafī. Riwāyah of Abū Ṭāhir Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad al-Silafī, d. 576/1180. Brockelmann, GAL, I, 602 (5). Incip.: ... اخبرنا ... السلفى الاصبهانى اح الشىخ ... الثقفى باصبهان سنة ثمان وثمانىن واربعمائة
author: Qāsim ibn al-Faḍl, 1006 or 7-1095 or 6.
title: al-Juzʼ al-sābiʻ min al-Fawāʼid al-ʻawālī al-muntaqāh min uṣūl samāʻāt... al-Thaqafī.
creator: Qāsim ibn al-Faḍl, 1006 or 7-1095 or 6.
subject: Hadith—Texts—Early works to 1800
member of collections: Princeton Digital Library of Islamic Manuscripts
